lines.text: Multiplying a vector by a scalar

secText:
Lesson:
1. Multiply a [OBJ:expsec_d483:vector by a positive scalar graphically].
2. Multiply a [OBJ:expsec_d483mi:vector by a negative scalar graphically].
3. Multiply a [OBJ:expsec_d485:vector by a scalar numerically].
4. Write vectors in [OBJ:expsec_d476:polar form].
5. Multiply a [OBJ:expsec_d488:polar vector by a scalar numerically].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37430:Multiply] a vector by a scalar numerically.
2. [OBJ:qc_37427:Write] a vector in polar form.
3. [OBJ:qc_37431:Multiply] a polar vector by a scalar numerically.
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_scalar_multiplication:Multiplying a Vector V by a Scalar C], [OBJ:sum_polar_vectors:Vectors in Polar Form], [OBJ:sum_mult_polar_scalar:Multiplying a Polar Vector by a Scalar]
